docs.title: Pyspectrum api reference
docs.text: The pyspectrum module allows communication with usb spectrometer from python code

docs.title: Spectrometer
docs.text: High-level class to work with different spectrometers. Currently only Usb spectrometer is supported

docs.title: __init__(device, pixel_start=0, pixel_end=4096, pixel_reverse=False, dark_signal_path='dark_signal.dat')
docs.text:
Parameters:

Name Type Description Default device internal.RawSpectrometer

Low-level device object

required pixel_start int

Index of the first usable diode

0 pixel_end int

Index of the last usable diode

4096 pixel_reverse bool

If True, diode order in frames will be reversed

False dark_signal_path str

Default path to load and save dark signal

'dark_signal.dat'
